Provide a clear and concise description of what the bug is.

1. Go to '...'
2. Run '...'
3. Observe the error

## Expected behavior
Describe what you expected to happen.

If applicable, add screenshots, error messages, or logs.

- OS: [e.g. Windows 10, macOS 13]
